Method Detail

asSearchResultEntry

public static SearchResultEntry asSearchResultEntry(AttributeSequence entry)
                                             throws NullPointerException
Returns a new search result entry backed by the provided entry. Modifications made to entry will be reflected in the search result entry. The returned search result entry supports updates to its list of controls, as well as updates to the name and attributes if the underlying entry allows.

The method newSearchResultEntry(org.opends.sdk.AttributeSequence) provides a deep-copy version of this method.

Parameters:
entry - The entry to be returned in the search result entry.
Returns:
The new search result entry.
Throws:
NullPointerException - If entry was null.

newSearchResultEntry

public static SearchResultEntry newSearchResultEntry(AttributeSequence entry)
                                              throws NullPointerException
Creates a new search result entry using the provided entry. The content of the provided entry will be copied into the new search result entry such that modifications to the returned search result entry (including attribute values) will not be reflected in the underlying entry.

The method asSearchResultEntry(org.opends.sdk.AttributeSequence) provides a shallow copy version of this method which should be used in cases where the additional copying performance overhead is to be avoided.

Parameters:
entry - The entry to be returned in the search result entry.
Returns:
The new search result entry.
Throws:
NullPointerException - If entry was null .

newSearchResultEntry

                                              throws NullPointerException
Creates a new search result entry using the provided distinguished.

Parameters:
dn - The distinguished of the search result entry.
Returns:
The new search result entry.
Throws:
NullPointerException - If dn was null.

newSearchResultReference

public static SearchResultReference newSearchResultReference(String uri)
                                                      throws NullPointerException
Creates a new search result reference using the provided continuation reference URI.

Parameters:
uri - The first continuation reference URI to be added to this search result reference.
Returns:
The new search result reference.
Throws:
NullPointerException - If uri was null.
